alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 10 at 3:00AM PST until February 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Dense fog, with visibility less than a quarter of a mile at times. * WHERE...In Washington, South Washington Coast. In Oregon, North Oregon Coast and Central Oregon Coast. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions gradually improve after 10 am today. Motorists should be ready for quick and sudden drops in visibility in the fog.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. If walking or biking, weather reflective material to make yourself more visible in the fog.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast
